title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
ingredients: ['For the Base', '500 g Strong White Bread Flour', '300 ml Warm Water', '10g Dried yeast', '1 level tablespoon Sugar', '1/2 teaspoon Salt', 'For the marinade', '1 Tablespoon Levi Roots Reggae Reggae Jerk BBQ Sauce', '1 Tablespoon Brown Sauce', '1 Tablespoon Tomato Ketchup', '1 Tablespoon Honey', 'For the Sauce', '1 Small onion - finely chopped', '2 Cloves Garlic: minced, crushed or finely chopped', '1 Tin Chopped tomatoes', '2 Tablespoons Fresh oregano', 'a good glug (approx 3 - 4 tablespoons) Olive Oil', 'Salt & Freshly Ground Black Pepper', 'For the Topping', 'Leftover cooked chicken', '70 - 100g Cheddar Cheese - Grated', '8 - 10 Black olives cut in 1/2']
